name: aviation-weather
description: Aviation Weather Center API providing access to weather observations and forecasts

tools.name: get_metar
tools.description: Get METAR (current weather observation) data for specified stations

ids.description: Comma-separated list of ICAO station identifiers (e.g., 'KJFK,KLAX')

hours.description: Number of hours before current time (1-24)

mostRecent.description: If true, return only the latest observation for each station
